ratings.notes: [proposed_contextual_controlled] Here at Inner Citadel Checkpoint and while on investigating duty, I cannot approve this urgent royal archive until verification is complete.<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>5<TAB>Overall quality meets the criteria with a slight edge in context relevance due to mentioning investigation duties.

[baseline_no_context] Access to the archives requires formal permission and a valid reason for entry.<TAB>2<TAB>4<TATB>3<TAB>5<TAB>Overall quality is consistent but lacks context relevance; it could be more natural if phrased differently.
"Maintained persona, but could improve naturalness and urgency in tone."
